ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: War Mongrels
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
War Mongrels, a paramilitary group consisting mainly of experienced war criminals bent removing those who get in their way.
Credits to: Dninemfive - 1.2 update solutions Saito Yui - Update for TraderKinds 1.1 Mehni - Update for backpacks 1.1 Ods - awesome apparel textures Jecrell, Jdalt40, dninemfive and Spdskatr - For C# coding assistance and patches Serbian Strong cover - MeowMusic
